暫時校方仍然封閉校園只限授權人士進入

Dear Students, Colleagues and Alumni

Please be informed that the cordon around the PolyU campus has been removed. In view of the extensive damage to our campus and to assure the safety of the campus, the University will launch a comprehensive assessment exercise in order to determine a thorough clean-up and restoration plan.

Even though dangerous materials have been removed and disposed of, the campus is still UNSAFE, and will continue be CLOSED. The campus will only be accessible to authorised persons until further notice.

We urge all students, staff, alumni and members of the public NOT to enter the campus, and we will update you on campus access arrangements from time to time.

We wish to express our sincere gratitude to all staff members, students and alumni for your understanding and support as well as your offers to assist the University in the campus clean-up and restoration work. We would certainly appreciate your assistance when it is safe to do so.

We continue to count on your support to restore the operation of the campus as soon as possible.

推左先
推

replies.msg:
【感謝美國保護香港大遊行】
【Expressing gratitude to USA for protecting Hong Kong】

遊行目的：感謝特朗普總統、美國國會以及美國人民支持通過香港人權及民主法案

日期：2019 年 12 月 1 日 (星期日)
時間：12:30 - 16:00
路線：遮打花園 > 美國駐香港總領事館 > 遮打花園

*不反對通知書已發出

TG Channel : https://t.me/ThankYouPresidentTrump
糾察招募 : https://t.me/joinchat/MaQNihPDW8aE1KwgJrGwAw

#香港 #美國 #自治 #HKAA #trump #LiberateHK #驅逐共黨
#天滅中共 #ThankYouUSA #ThankYouTrump #已出不反

replies.msg:
今日黑狗解封後去附近睇過。各「主要」出入口都有保安人員，唔會俾人入。

但理工咁大，重有好多細嘅出入口，係無人把守嘅。而除此之外，因為好多建築物嘅玻璃係爛咗，所以又成為咗一啲細嘅出入口。

據我嘅觀察，如果單純以「出入」黎講，係無問題嘅。

至於黑狗會否跟踪由理大出嚟嘅人，我覺得就算跟到都無乜用。因為自黑狗解封後，唔洗五分鐘蘋果直播已經訪問咗兩個剛剛進入理大嘅人士。所以，而家係理大出現嘅人，與黑狗早前所講嘅「暴動」並無直接關係。

衝乜野
係而家呢個情況
入面啲人直接出嚟就得啦
又想比班狗再封過?
